name: Heady
description:
Heady leverages technology to create custom experiences for achieving business goals. 
Our mission is to deliver top-notch apps at affordable rates. We offer a multitude of services — strategy, user experience design (UX), User Interface design (UI), software engineering, testing, marketing, analytics, and maintenance — all of which come together to form a successful product.

locations.address: 613, Damji Shamji Business Galleria, LBS Road, Kanjurmarg
